title: HTML/CSS
overview: Learn the basics of HTML and CSS to create beautiful and responsive web pages.
objectives: Understand the structure and syntax of HTML and CSS
Create basic web pages with HTML and CSS
Use responsive design techniques to make your pages work well on different devices

title: JavaScript Core
overview: Learn the basics of JavaScript programming, including variables, data types, and control flow.
objectives: Understand the basic syntax and data types of JavaScript
Write basic scripts to manipulate the DOM and handle user interactions
Use control flow statements like if/else and loops to create complex behavior

title: React
overview: Learn how to build complex, dynamic user interfaces using the React JavaScript library.
objectives: Understand the basic principles of React, including components and state
Create complex user interfaces using components and props
Use the React lifecycle methods to handle events and manage state

title: Node.js
overview: Learn how to use Node.js to build powerful, scalable web applications and APIs.
objectives: Understand the basic architecture and syntax of Node.js
Create server-side applications using Node.js and Express
Build RESTful APIs to connect your applications to the web
